other_tests.findings: Biopsy pathology indicated a metastatic squamous carcinoma.
Demonstrated multiple 18F-FDG-avid lesions involving the nasal tip, bilateral lungs, right hilum and mediastinum, and rectum. The nasal-tip mass had an SUV max of 15.5.
Revealed a pulmonary squamous cell carcinoma, consistent with the nasal-tip lesion pathologically.
